step1.title: Sign up
step1.description: You can sign up with either email or your Google account. Initially we only need an email address, no other information.

steps.title: Quick sign-up
steps.description: you can sign up with email or Google account.

steps.title: No credit card
steps.description: you can try for free with up to three employees.

steps.title: Easy initial setup
steps.description: just add yourself as an employee and get started!

step2.title: Plan
step2.description: Adding teams and employees takes a few minutes. You can start creating your first shift schedule right away.

steps.title: No unnecessary data entry
steps.description: the app only asks for necessary information, essentially name and email. Nothing else.

steps.title: No unnecessary clicking
steps.description: shifts are added to the calendar by dragging employees to the right place. Shift length and location can also be adjusted by dragging.

steps.title: Necessary additional information
steps.description: you can easily add comments to shifts, e.g. "store manager".

step3.title: Approve
step3.description: Share the shift plan effortlessly and quickly with employees in your preferred channel and request feedback before publishing.

steps.title: Copy image of shift schedule
steps.description: you can easily paste it into a WhatsApp message.

steps.title: Save image of shift schedule
steps.description: you can easily attach it as an email attachment.

step4.title: Publish
step4.description: Publish the shift schedule with one click and send it automatically to employees by email.

steps.title: Automated sending
steps.description: when you publish the schedule, it is automatically sent to all employees on the schedule.

steps.title: Personal schedule
steps.description: each employee receives a personalized schedule of their own shifts.

step5.title: Unlimited number of teams
step5.description: Each team has its own schedules and settings, but you can share employees between teams.

steps.title: Own settings
steps.description: each team can have its own default times and shift lengths.

steps.title: Sharing employees
steps.description: employees can be in multiple teams, which facilitates shift planning for multi-location businesses.

steps.title: Publishing schedules
steps.description: you can publish schedules by team or all at once.

cost.question: How much does this cost?
cost.answer: Pricing is based on the number of employees:
cost.vat: 24% VAT is added to all prices.

trial.question: Can I try without paying?
trial.answer: Of course! Running with less than four employees is always free!

commitment.question: How long do I need to commit?
commitment.answer: Payment is handled month by month, and you can cancel your subscription at any time. No commitment periods. For example, a summer restaurant can pay for use during the summer and cancel the subscription for winter.

start.question: When can I start?
start.answer: Registration and initial setup takes about 3 minutes. You can publish your first shift schedule in about 15 minutes.

creator.question: Who made this?
creator.answer: I'm Antti Tuomola. I have over 15 years of experience in the restaurant industry as an employee, manager and entrepreneur. I've worked in neighborhood bars and Michelin restaurants, run manor restaurants and food trucks. Whatever I've done, I've always made shift schedules. Sometimes with Excel, sometimes with purpose-built software. I've never been completely satisfied with them. Hence this.

difficulty.question: Is this difficult to use?
difficulty.answer: The entire app is built with the idea that creating shift schedules should be as easy as possible. The interface is graphical, and shifts are added by dragging employee names to the right place.

publish.question: How does publishing schedules work?
publish.answer: When the schedule is ready to publish, you just press the Publish button, which sends an email to all employees on the schedule (and others if needed) with the employee's personal shift schedule. You can also copy an image or PDF and publish it however you want.

difference.question: How does this differ from MaraPlan / Planier / HR plans / etc.?
difference.answer: Työvuorolista differs from other industry players in these ways:
points: Prices are publicly visible: we don't try to squeeze the maximum price from your company, but publish all prices openly.
You can start using Työvuorolista now, in five minutes. Publish a schedule in 15 minutes. No contact requests, quotes, demos, counter-quotes and other time-wasting.
Työvuorolista is so simple that you don't need training to use it. If you want, we can go through its use together, but I also trust that you can use this without hand-holding.

Fewer features: we focus only on creating shift schedules, publishing and recording hours. We don't offer mobile apps for your employees that they don't want. You can handle shift reporting however you see fit.
